title: Unable to lock in
body: I couldn't lock in as ahri, as soon as I clicked "Lock In", it greyed out. I just waited for the timer to count out and that worked. I'm posting here because the last time this happened, I tried to select a different champ, but that champ was locked as soon as I selected it, as if the client delayed locking in my champion until a new one was selected.

replies.body: Maybe try and trick it by choosing a champ you won't play and then selecting the one you will? It's all about the mind-games when you're dealing with the client.
this happens to me occasionally too although not often except it would turn orange so i could click it after a while
